meanings.definition: Sell or offer for sale at an auction.
meanings.sent1: The old painting was auctioned to the highest bidder.
meanings.sent2: They auctioned off their antique furniture collection.
meanings.sent3: The auctioned vase turned out to be a priceless artifact.
meanings.sent4: Her talent was auctioned to the world through her first art exhibition.
meanings.sent5: The auctioned car gleamed under the bright auction lights.

meanings.definition: To sell something at an auction.
meanings.sent1: The charity auctioned the donated items to raise funds.
meanings.sent2: He decided to auction his rare coin collection.
meanings.sent3: The auctioned bicycle had a race with a scooter.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were auctioned off to the highest bidder.
meanings.sent5: The auctioned jewelry sparkled on the display table.
